name: CoLab
headline: Build better hardware products, faster.
description: CoLab is on a mission to accelerate the pace of innovation by helping engineering teams deliver better products faster. CoLab’s Design Engagement System (DES) enables engineering teams to have more effective design conversations, and ultimately make better engineering decisions. CoLab is trusted by Fortune 500 organizations like Komatsu, Polaris, Johnson Controls, Hyundai Mobis, Schneider Electric and Lockheed Martin.

founders.name: Jeremy Andrews, Founder
founders.description: Mechanical engineer from Newfoundland and Labrador, Canada. Identified a need for better collaboration tools for mechanical engineers while working at Tesla, designing components for the Model 3 battery pack. Co-founded CoLab Software in 2017 to develop a modern, collaborative design review solution.

founders.name: Adam Keating, Founder
founders.description:
Mechanical Engineer building collaboration software to give other mechanical engineers and their teams the tools they need for efficient agile hardware development.

Previously worked on one the world's first hyperloop vehicles, a patent-pending electric propulsion system for large-scale aircraft, the world's first biology-guided radiotherapy system and several multi-billion dollar energy projects.

# Run better design reviews, make better product decisions
When you don’t give people a chance to provide design feedback — or when their feedback slips through the cracks — design quality suffers. CoLab makes it easy for anyone to review CAD and automates issue tracking, so that engineering teams can design better products faster.
[GET A DEMO](http://colabsoftware.com/</get-a-demo>)[SEE HOW IT WORKS](http://colabsoftware.com/</product/overview>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/6638ca8bb1d6847949e819cc_Home%20Page%20Hero.webp)

![number one](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/66291472ef0d2f09a5a1a384_Section%201%20-%20Sidebar%20line.svg)
Why it matters
## What is the cost of sloppy decision-making?
Your most critical product decisions are made every day in design reviews. When those reviews are ineffective (or when they get skipped), you risk locking in bad decisions that hurt quality, gross margins, and customer trust.
![number two](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/66291472ef0d2f09a5a1a3a5_15215.svg)
What the data says
## We surveyed 250 engineering leaders and they told us 43% of design feedback slips through the cracks.
That’s a lot of chances for an error, quality problem, or safety critical issue to make it to production.
[DOWNLOAD THE FULL DATASET](http://colabsoftware.com/</report-impact-design-review>)
![number 3](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/66291473ef0d2f09a5a1a3d1_54747457.svg)
How to fix it
## Why are design ideas slipping through the cracks?
Most teams generate feedback in long, hard to schedule meetings, then spend hours tracking issues in spreadsheets and emails.With CoLab, you can document simple issues asynchronously, then use your meetings to solve tough technical problems. We’ll take care of documentation and tracking for you automatically, as you do the work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/673f5a8897e7c8be02caff31_Untitled-2.png)
## Better reviews. Less “slipping through the cracks.”

Discuss issues in real-time via threads.](http://colabsoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-2>)### [Automate Issue TrackingCoLab automatically tracks and organizes everyone’s feedback, as you do a review.](http://colabsoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-3>)### [Analyze TrendsCapture performance data for your reviews and use insights to drive continuous improvement.](http://colabsoftware.com/<#w-tabs-0-data-w-pane-4>)
![review ai](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/674dee87676c8fbc9b45d92f_ReviewAI-white.png)
# Automate lessons learned and routine design checks with ReviewAI
As your team uses CoLab and more data gets collected, ReviewAI starts to surface lessons learned automatically. Eventually, you can even ask ReviewAI to complete simple design checks for you. So, your team can do more high-impact engineering work.
[Learn More](http://colabsoftware.com/</product/reviewai>)
![Add files to portal ](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/674f0a0a478518fc96721923_chassis.avif)
## Connecting CoLab with PLM and CAD is fast, easy, and secure.
CoLab integrates with major PLM systems, including Windchill, Teamcenter, and 3DXPERIENCE. You can share CAD directly to CoLab from your PLM, maintaining critical data associations. Because CoLab accepts 30+ file types, it’s easy to review native CAD, even if you’re working with a supplier or customer that uses a different CAD tool.
[LEARN MORE ABOUT INTEGRATIONS](http://colabsoftware.com/</product/integrations>)
## Engineering teams are transforming how they work with CoLab
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b26_Blue%20Pin%20Icon.svg)New Product Development30%shorter lead times“We’re now starting to work with conversion partners through CoLab years before we’re ready to go into production, which historically is when they’d see that first bit of product.”![Robert Taylor](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b25_Simon%20Robinson.webp)Simon RobinsonChief Engineer, Ford ProRead the story](http://colabsoftware.com/</case-studies/case-study-ford-pro>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b29_Orange%20Pin%20Icon.svg)Value Analysis8 figuresin cost savings“With our normal in person events we’d find more than 100 opportunities for value-add on the models we’re reviewing. This year with our virtual events in CoLab, we’re averaging over 200.”![Brian Stauffer](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b2d_Brian%20Stauffer.webp)Brian StaufferGlobal Product Design Manager, JCIRead the story](http://colabsoftware.com/</case-studies/johnson-controls-builds-industry-leading-engineering-change-and-design-review-process>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b2b_Green%20Pin%20Icon.svg)Product Redesigns2Xfaster design cycles“Something that used to take a full year, we got it done in six months. And I personally have never overseen a cost reduction redesign of that scale and been able to hit a 50% cost reduction on it.”![Kevin Walters](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/6633c77234e9c60a637f1ac0/6633c77234e9c60a637f1b3f_Kevin%20Walters%20\(2\).webp)Kevin WaltersSr. Director of Hardware, MainspringRead the story](http://colabsoftware.com/</case-studies/mainspring-colab-case-study-cost-reduction>)
## Better products start with better design conversations.
Curious how CoLab can help you with that? Let’s talk.
[GET A DEMO](http://colabsoftware.com/</get-a-demo>)

![number two⟨61⟩]
What the data says
## We surveyed 250 engineering leaders and they told us 43% of design feedback slips through the cracks.
That’s a lot of chances for an error, quality problem, or safety critical issue to make it to production.
DOWNLOAD THE FULL DATASET⟨62⟩
![number 3⟨63⟩]
How to fix it
## Why are design ideas slipping through the cracks?
Most teams generate feedback in long, hard to schedule meetings, then spend hours tracking issues in spreadsheets and emails.With CoLab, you can document simple issues asynchronously, then use your meetings to solve tough technical problems. We’ll take care of documentation and tracking for you automatically, as you do the work.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5e4d9854e6dad067f4b514b3/673f5a8897e7c8be02caff31_Untitled-2.png)
## Better reviews. Less “slipping through the cracks.”
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
Your browser does not support the video tag. 
### Request ReviewsGenerate feedback before your meetings and include people that normally couldn’t attend.⟨64⟩### Enable Active ParticipationDuring a review, everyone can manipulate the model how they want to (or follow another).⟨65⟩### Capture and Discuss FeedbackPin comments to model geometry, creating a saved view state. Discuss issues in real-time via threads.⟨66⟩### Automate Issue TrackingCoLab automatically tracks and organizes everyone’s feedback, as you do a review.⟨67⟩### Analyze TrendsCapture performance data for your reviews and use insights to drive continuous improvement.⟨68⟩
![review ai⟨69⟩]
# Automate lessons learned and routine design checks with ReviewAI
As your team uses CoLab and more data gets collected, ReviewAI starts to surface lessons learned automatically. Eventually, you can even ask ReviewAI to complete simple design checks for you. So, your team can do more high-impact engineering work.
Learn More⟨22⟩
![Add files to portal ⟨70⟩]
## Connecting CoLab with PLM and CAD is fast, easy, and secure.
CoLab integrates with major PLM systems, including Windchill, Teamcenter, and 3DXPERIENCE. You can share CAD directly to CoLab from your PLM, maintaining critical data associations. Because CoLab accepts 30+ file types, it’s easy to review native CAD, even if you’re working with a supplier or customer that uses a different CAD tool.
LEARN MORE ABOUT INTEGRATIONS⟨71⟩
## Engineering teams are transforming how they work with CoLab
![⟨72⟩New Product Development30%shorter lead times“We’re now starting to work with conversion partners through CoLab years before we’re ready to go into production, which historically is when they’d see that first bit of product.”![Robert Taylor⟨73⟩]Simon RobinsonChief Engineer, Ford ProRead the story](http://colabsoftware.com/</case-studies/case-study-ford-pro>)
![⟨74⟩Value Analysis8 figuresin cost savings“With our normal in person events we’d find more than 100 opportunities for value-add on the models we’re reviewing. ![⟨76⟩Product Redesigns2Xfaster design cycles“Something that used to take a full year, we got it done in six months. generated_description:
**CoLab: Rapidly Building Better Hardware Products**

Founded in 2017 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S19, CoLab operates out of St. John’s, Canada. With a team of 120 employees, their mission is clear: to catalyze innovation by enabling engineering teams to create better hardware products, and to do so more quickly.

**What They Do:**

CoLab offers a Design Engagement System (DES), a software that transforms how engineering teams communicate. By streamlining design discussions—often bogged down by endless email threads and scheduling challenges—CoLab makes it easier for teams to surface critical feedback, make informed decisions, and ultimately enhance product quality. Their platform automates issue tracking and facilitates real-time collaboration, meaning less time is spent on administrative tasks and more on actual engineering.

**Trusted by Industry Leaders:**

CoLab is recognized by major Fortune 500 companies, including Komatsu, Polaris, Johnson Controls, and Lockheed Martin. These trusts speak volumes about the reliability of their solutions in highly competitive industries.

**Key Features:**

- **Collaboration:** Twofold speed in design reviews and secure, straightforward file sharing.
- **Feedback Management:** Directly comment on 2D or 3D models and transform design insights into actionable issues without complicated spreadsheets.
- **Automation:** Their ReviewAI feature not only tracks feedback but also helps prevent recurring issues by leveraging machine learning to surface lessons learned.

**Impact and Benefits:**

Among the statistics shared, CoLab boasts:
- Significant reductions in lead times by 30% 
- Cost savings of up to eight figures for major clients
- 4x faster supplier review processes

This measurable impact provides tangible proof of their capability to drive results.

**Next Steps:**

If you’re part of an engineering team looking to enhance collaboration and improve product quality, CoLab might just be the partner you need. Their platform seamlessly connects with major Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) systems, making integration straightforward.

For more information and to see how CoLab can foster better design conversations, visit their website at [CoLab Software](http://colabsoftware.com). Whether you want to understand more about their features, explore case studies, or schedule a demo, CoLab is set up to help fast-track your design process.

In a world where the speed of development is often the difference between success and failure, CoLab stands out as a game-changer in hardware product development.
